item.title: Trump administration blocks Harvard from enrolling international students
item.description: The Trump administration's move against Harvard University comes amid a battle with the Ivy League school over concerns about antisemitism on campus.

item.title: Trump tax bill clears the House in a victory for Republicans, advances to the Senate
item.description: The early morning vote along party lines came after 48 hours of furious negotiations to win over warring factions in the Republican conference.

item.title: Woman shot at CIA headquarters after crashing into gate
item.description: The non-fatal shooting on CIA property occurred hours after two Israeli Embassy staff members were shot and killed outside D.C.'s Capital Jewish Museu...

item.title: Trump tax bill heads to the House floor for a vote after last-minute changes
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson must unify his conference's hard-line conservatives and its moderate Republicans from blue states.

item.title: Trump administration formally accepts gift jet from Qatar
item.description: Qatar's gift to the Trump administration has drawn accusations of bribery from Democrats and warnings about cost and timeline from aviation experts.
